title: Worldcoin (WLD) Soars by 25% in a Single Day: What Are the Next Targets?
body: TL;DR Renowned analysts eye further upside, with some envisioning triple-digit increases. WLD’s price surge is likely fueled by Worldcoin’s new AMPC technology, which enhances privacy for Orb-verified users. The Impressive Pump WLD – the main utility and governance token within the Worldcoin ecosystem – recorded a 25% price increase in the past 24 hours, briefly surging to $1.30 (the highest point since the end of July). WLD Price, Source: CoinGecko It is the best-performing cryptocurrency for that timeframe (from the top 100 club), surpassing the gains posted by PENGU (+13%), FORM (+11%), and HYPE (+7%). The market capitalization of WLD climbed to $2.5 billion, thus making it the 63rd-biggest digital asset and flipping well-known altcoins like Algorand (ALGO), Render (RENDER), Cosmos Hub (ATOM), and others. Somewhat expected, the price increase caught the eye of numerous analysts, some of whom believe there’s more room for growth. The X user Lucky (who has over two million followers) thinks WLD “is aiming for a spectacular breakout,” targeting a rally beyond $4. According to Captain Faibik, the asset’s price is on the verge of a multi-year trendline breakout. If flipped to the upside, this formation could lead to a 200% pump in the short term. What Drives the Rally? The recent advancement of the crypto project Worldcoin could be considered among the main catalysts. Earlier this month, the World Foundation teamed up with TACEO, Inversed Tech, Modulus Labs, and Automata to release AMPC (or anonymized multi-party computation). “The open source quantum anonymizes and securely protects shards of numerical codes of Orb-verified World ID holders,” the official announcement reads. To the uninitiated, Worldcoin allows users to scan their iris, and as an incentive, they receive WLD tokens. The recently introduced AMPC eliminates the need to store numerical codes derived from the iris and simplifies the verification process. It also operates with reputable third parties like the University of Erlangen-Nuremberg (FAU), UC Berkeley Center for Responsible Decentralized Intelligence (RDI), and others. Over the weekend, Worldcoin revealed that the University of Engineering and Technology in Peru also joined as an AMPC partner. Another factor that may have positively impacted the asset’s price is the renewed investor interest. According to CoinMarketCap, WLD is among the top 10 trending cryptocurrencies today, while its trading volume on a 24-hour scale has jumped well above $1 billion. The post Worldcoin (WLD) Soars by 25% in a Single Day: What Are the Next Targets? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: MegaETH Stablecoin: A Game-Changing Partnership with Ethena Unveiled
body: BitcoinWorld MegaETH Stablecoin: A Game-Changing Partnership with Ethena Unveiled The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with exciting news! A significant development is on the horizon as MegaETH, a rapidly evolving EVM-compatible blockchain, prepares to launch its highly anticipated native asset: the MegaETH stablecoin , USDm. This move is set to make waves, especially given its strategic partnership with Ethena (ENA), a prominent name in the DeFi space. This collaboration aims to introduce a new layer of stability and utility to the decentralized finance ecosystem. What Makes the MegaETH Stablecoin Launch So Significant? The introduction of USDm marks a pivotal moment for the MegaETH ecosystem. Stablecoins are crucial for the crypto market, offering a bridge between volatile digital assets and traditional fiat currencies. By creating its own native stablecoin, MegaETH is not only enhancing its infrastructure but also providing its users with a reliable tool for transactions, lending, and yield generation without the constant worry of price fluctuations. This initiative is designed to foster greater adoption and utility within its growing community. The partnership with Ethena is a cornerstone of this launch. Ethena, known for its synthetic dollar protocol, brings a robust and innovative approach to stablecoin collateralization. Initially, USDm will be backed by Ethena’s USDtb. This choice underscores a commitment to leveraging established and secure mechanisms to ensure the stability and integrity of the new MegaETH stablecoin . How Will USDm Ensure Stability and Trust? Ensuring the stability of a stablecoin is paramount, and MegaETH is taking a thoughtful approach. The initial collateralization by Ethena’s USDtb provides a solid foundation. USDtb is designed to maintain its peg through a combination of delta-hedged derivatives and other robust strategies, offering a reliable backing for USDm. This mechanism is crucial for building user confidence and attracting liquidity. Looking ahead, the plan includes the potential to diversify the collateral reserves. There’s talk of integrating other prominent tokens, such as USDe, into USDm’s backing. This strategic diversification could further enhance the stability and resilience of the MegaETH stablecoin , making it less susceptible to single-asset risks and more adaptable to market changes. Such flexibility is key for long-term success in the dynamic DeFi landscape. What Are the Benefits for MegaETH Users and the Broader DeFi Ecosystem? This strategic launch positions MegaETH to become a more comprehensive and attractive platform for decentralized applications and financial services. The collaboration with Ethena not only brings technical expertise but also strengthens the overall credibility of the MegaETH stablecoin in a competitive market. Here are some key benefits: Enhanced Stability: Users gain access to a reliable, low-volatility asset for holding value within the MegaETH ecosystem. Increased Utility: USDm can be seamlessly integrated into various DeFi applications on MegaETH, including decentralized exchanges, lending protocols, and yield farming platforms. Reduced Volatility Risk: Businesses and individuals can conduct transactions without the concern of sudden price swings common with other cryptocurrencies. Broader Adoption: A robust native stablecoin can attract new users and developers to the MegaETH blockchain, fostering innovation and growth. What Challenges Might the MegaETH Stablecoin Face? While the prospects are bright, launching a new stablecoin isn’t without its challenges. The competitive stablecoin market is dominated by established players, requiring USDm to prove its unique value proposition and maintain its peg consistently. Regulatory scrutiny on stablecoins is also increasing globally, which could impact operational frameworks. Furthermore, managing the collateralization mechanism effectively, especially with the planned diversification, will be critical to sustaining trust and stability. Building sufficient liquidity and widespread adoption for the MegaETH stablecoin will be ongoing efforts. A Future of Stability with MegaETH Stablecoin The launch of the MegaETH stablecoin , USDm, in partnership with Ethena represents a significant leap forward for the MegaETH blockchain. By introducing a robust, native stablecoin backed initially by USDtb and potentially other assets like USDe, MegaETH is paving the way for a more stable, versatile, and user-friendly DeFi experience. This initiative underscores MegaETH’s commitment to innovation and its vision for a resilient decentralized future. As USDm integrates into the ecosystem, it promises to unlock new opportunities for users and developers alike, solidifying MegaETH’s position in the competitive crypto landscape. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is USDm? A1: USDm is the new native stablecoin launched by MegaETH, an EVM-compatible blockchain project. It’s designed to provide a stable digital asset for transactions and DeFi activities within the MegaETH ecosystem. Q2: How is USDm collateralized? A2: Initially, USDm will be collateralized by Ethena’s USDtb. There are plans to potentially diversify its reserves in the future by including other tokens such as USDe. Q3: Who is Ethena, and what is its role? A3: Ethena (ENA) is a synthetic dollar protocol that MegaETH is partnering with. Ethena provides the initial collateral asset, USDtb, and its expertise in stablecoin mechanisms to help ensure USDm’s stability. Q4: What are the main benefits of USDm for users? A4: USDm offers enhanced stability, increased utility within MegaETH’s DeFi applications, reduced volatility risk for transactions, and aims to attract broader adoption to the MegaETH blockchain. Q5: When is USDm expected to launch? A5: While the article announces MegaETH’s plans to launch USDm, specific launch dates are typically announced closer to the event by the project itself. Users should follow official MegaETH channels for precise timelines. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your network on social media to spread the word about the exciting future of the MegaETH stablecoin and its impact on decentralized finance! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping stablecoin institutional adoption. title: Solana Rally in Sight? Traders Eye Breakout That Could Push SOL Toward $250
body: Solana (SOL) is once again back in the spotlight as bullish momentum returns to the crypto market. After briefly touching $212 last week, the altcoin retraced to around $209 but has held strong, sparking renewed optimism among traders. Related Reading: Bitcoin LTH Aging Velocity Turns Negative: Distribution Phase Unfolds Analysts now see a potential rally toward the $250 level, supported by growing institutional flows and speculation around a Solana spot ETF. Bitget Wallet’s CMO Jamie Elkaleh noted that “ETF conversations around SOL are further amplifying interest,” pointing to the more favorable regulatory tone emerging in the U.S. Market watchers believe a Solana ETF could drive adoption at scale, positioning SOL as one of the strongest altcoins to buy ahead of the next wave of institutional products. Solana ETF Buzz Fuels Momentum for Altcoins Solana isn’t the only digital asset grabbing attention. Wall Street analysts increasingly expect the U.S. SEC to broaden ETF approvals beyond Bitcoin and Ethereum. Among the top contenders are Solana, XRP, and Cardano, three coins that already boast high liquidity and established derivatives markets. Bloomberg’s James Seyffart suggested that assets like Solana and XRP are “well-positioned to qualify under existing listing rules,” with institutional demand likely to surge once funds launch. If approved, the introduction of a Solana ETF could trigger a demand shock, unlocking new inflows and strengthening its long-term market structure. Why Traders Are Watching SOL Closely Beyond ETF speculation, Solana’s on-chain growth continues to capture attention. The network recently hit a milestone with Real World Assets (RWAs) surpassing $500 million, underscoring growing institutional adoption of tokenized traditional assets. At the same time, Solana has maintained strong trading activity, with daily DEX volume reaching nearly $7.93 billion, even outpacing Ethereum. On the technical front, SOL is showing signs of resilience. Trading at around $209.30, the token sits comfortably above key moving averages, with the 7-day SMA at $206.70 providing immediate support. SOL's price trends to the upside on the daily chart. title: Strategic Solana Reserve Piling Up – Here’s How Much SOL Have Been Accumulated
body: In the ongoing bull market cycle, Solana’s price has showcased a remarkable performance, reaching a new all-time high earlier this year. However, one of the most recent developments around the leading altcoin that is gaining significant interest and attention in the current market cycle is a strategic SOL reserve. Institutional Demand For Solana Continues To Grow As cryptocurrency assets gain notable traction in the dynamic financial sector, the strategic Solana reserve is piling up at a rapid rate. In a post on the X platform, Crypto Patel, a market expert, has outlined the growth of the SOL strategic reserves among institutional entities, as they continuously add the asset to their treasury . With steady acquisitions fueling its treasury, the reserve has become a cornerstone of confidence. Specifically, the rapid growth in the initiative signals growing institutional conviction in SOL’s long-term potential as a leading asset and blockchain ecosystem . Since the first move to owning a strategic SOL reserves, the initiative has reached a whopping 8.9 million SOL, which is valued at over $1.5 billion at current market prices. This pattern of stockpiling highlights the growing need for SOL as a strategic asset and fortifies the groundwork for future growth. After institutions have acquired more than 8.9 million SOL, these entities now control about 1.55% of Solana’s total supply in circulation. Data shared by the expert shows that 13 major institutional entities currently hold this massive supply of SOL. Crypto Patel has underlined three key reasons why this robust interest from large businesses is a pivotal development for Solana . Addressing the significance of the sharp growth in the initiative, Crypto Patel highlighted that it often indicates a robust trust on the institutional level. Even though only 13 entities own a SOL treasury, concentration among a small number of organizations can still affect governance and liquidity. Lastly, he also noted that this kind of large-scale accumulation frequently precedes long-term ecosystem expansion. As SOL slowly gains upward momentum, the large-scale accumulation may imply that the big players are prepping up for the next SOL bull cycle. In the meantime, this remarkable growth in strategic Solana reserve positions the altcoin as one of the most closely watched treasuries in the digital sector. SOL’s Strong Transaction Activity Solana’s on-chain activity has been steadily rising, particularly its transaction count. According to data shared by Rand, SOL recorded a staggering 2.9 billion in total transaction count in August alone, which reaffirms its status as one of the most scalable and efficient blockchains in the industry . This massive wave of transactions represents a 46% growth in year-over-year transactions, highlighting the network’s technical strength and rising adoption. It also reflects a more than 4x growth over the combined transaction count of all the other networks. Such a development reinforces SOL’s dominance in the broader blockchain landscape.

title: Binance Becomes Largest XRP Holder
body: Xaif, a widely followed crypto commentator on X, set the market abuzz today after revealing that Binance has surpassed Uphold to become the largest holder of XRP. According to Xaif, the exchange now controls more than 2 billion XRP in custody, which he valued at around $5.1 billion. The revelation triggered immediate scrutiny from analysts and traders, many of whom turned to blockchain explorers and independent data trackers to confirm the claim. On-Chain Data Confirms Binance’s Lead Data from the XRP Ledger indicates multiple wallets linked to Binance hold significant amounts of XRP. Aggregators that monitor exchange balances have consistently ranked Binance among the top custodians of the asset. BREAKING: Binance Surpasses Uphold! Binance Becomes the Largest $XRP Holder Reveals over 2 Billion XRP in balance worth $5.1Billion! https://t.co/f22RmlILrG pic.twitter.com/q6mMDSPdwJ — Xaif Crypto | (@Xaif_Crypto) September 8, 2025 Recent snapshots suggest that when these wallets are combined, the exchange’s holdings exceed 2 billion XRP, placing it ahead of Uphold and other platforms considered dominant custodians. This alignment between Xaif’s post and the available on-chain records strengthens the credibility of the claim. Valuation: Numbers Tell a Bigger Story Xaif’s estimate of $5.1 billion likely reflected XRP’s price at the moment of his reporting. However, using the live market price of roughly $2.98 per XRP, Binance’s 2 billion holdings translate closer to $5.96 billion. These differences are typical, reflecting the rapid changes in crypto prices and varying valuations across exchanges. Regardless of which figure is used, the scale of Binance’s XRP balance underscores the exchange’s outsized role in the ecosystem. What It Means to Be the “Largest Holder” While Binance appears to be the largest single custodian, it is crucial to clarify what this status entails. The XRP held in Binance’s wallets is not owned outright by the exchange but is instead pooled on behalf of millions of users across its platform. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Wallet tagging and address clustering, techniques used by blockchain analysts, offer reliable insight into exchange balances but are not flawless. Funds frequently move between hot wallets, cold storage, and settlement addresses, meaning tallies can shift quickly. Nevertheless, Binance’s dominance is evident when aggregating its custodial holdings. Implications for XRP Markets Binance’s position as the largest XRP custodian has meaningful implications for liquidity and price stability. The concentration of such vast holdings on a single platform means Binance can heavily influence order book depth and trading volumes. For XRP’s global market, this translates to greater liquidity but also highlights the reliance on centralized exchanges for custody. Analysts note that while XRP’s underlying ledger is decentralized, the custody concentration reflects the practical realities of how most investors access and trade digital assets today. Xaif’s report has therefore reshaped the current conversation around XRP supply dynamics. By overtaking Uphold, Binance has cemented its position as the primary hub for XRP liquidity. While market watchers continue to monitor wallet movements, the present snapshot shows that Binance’s role in XRP markets has never been stronger. title: Grayscale Pushes for Spot Chainlink ETF Approval in the U.S.
body: Grayscale has taken another step in expanding its crypto portfolio by filing first spot Chainlink (LINK) exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to American markets. This move, which also includes a possible staking feature, was announced in a recent S-1 registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Grayscale to Convert Chainlink Trust to ETF The proposed product is designed as a conversion of the existing Grayscale Chainlink Trust. If approved, it would trade on NYSE Arca under the ticker GLNK, with Coinbase Custody Trust Company acting as custodian. Investors would gain direct exposure to the price of LINK, the token that powers Chainlink’s decentralized oracle network. Unlike traditional trusts, the ETF would process share creations and redemptions in cash. This follows the same model used by recently approved spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. However, the filing leaves room for in-kind redemptions in the future if regulators approve. What makes the filing especially notable is the potential staking component. The ETF may allocate a portion of its LINK to staking if regulatory and tax conditions allow. This could create an additional stream of income for investors in the form of rewards. Staking would be handled by third-party providers, while the tokens themselves remain under custody. The fund would decide whether rewards are retained, sold, or distributed. Part of a Bigger ETF Race Bitwise was the first to file for an ETF focused on Chainlink (LINK). Grayscale’s new filing shows that big investors are paying more attention to Chainlink’s network. Meanwhile, Grayscale has not limited its ambitions to Chainlink. In recent weeks, it has filed for Avalanche and Dogecoin ETFs. This adds to earlier filings for Solana (SOL), Litecoin (LITE), and XRP. Also, big asset managers like 21Shares and VanEck are rushing to get their own spot crypto ETFs approved. This new wave of ETF filings comes at a time when the rules and oversight around crypto are becoming friendlier. Following Grayscale’s filing, the price of LINK went up by almost 4%, reaching $23.00, according to CoinMarketCap data. Chainlink Strengthens Network With New LINK Reserve and Major Milestones Chainlink is one of the most popular decentralized oracle networks. It allows blockchains to connect with real-world data in a safe way. LINK, the platform’s own token, is used to pay node operators and also helps secure the network through staking. In August, Chainlink launched a special LINK reserve that is supported by both on-chain and off-chain revenue. The goal is to support the protocol’s long-term growth and stability. This move came shortly after Chainlink reached a major milestone. Reportedly, Chainlink is now the first platform to earn ISO 27001 certification and SOC 2 Type 1 attestation. The platform’s progress is also attracting traditional finance players. Real asset manager Caliber recently announced plans to build a crypto treasury by betting on Chainlink’s native token LINK. The post Grayscale Pushes for Spot Chainlink ETF Approval in the U.S. appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Altcoins Feel The Pinch As Crypto Market Sentiment Sours
body: The crypto market slipped into a risk-off mood over the weekend as the Crypto Fear & Greed Index fell to 44, moving from Neutral into Fear. Related Reading: MemeCore Explodes 3,800% For ATH — But Is A Collapse Around The Corner? Traders Shift Toward Large Caps Santiment said a heavy focus on large-caps can signal more cautious behavior among traders. Based on reports, that pattern was visible on Saturday when market activity narrowed and attention tightened around the biggest tokens. According to data firm Santiment, traders are pulling money out of obscure altcoins and putting it back into major names like Bitcoin, Ether, and XRP. Bitfinex analysts added that a broader return of momentum to smaller coins may wait until more spot crypto ETFs launch later this year. Price Moves Are Mixed According to Coingecko, Bitcoin is down 5% over the past month while Ether has risen 9% over the same period. The wider altcoin group is under pressure, even as a few tokens show isolated strength. CoinMarketCap’s Altcoin Season Index stood at 56 on Sunday, a level that technically meets the threshold for Altcoin Season when comparing the top 100 altcoins versus Bitcoin over a 90-day window. 🚨 THIS IS THE FINAL SHAKEOUT FOR ALTCOINS Alts are more OVERSOLD than during: COVID FTX Crash Tariff War No one believes anymore That’s exactly why the altseason is coming pic.twitter.com/7VTU742qmU — Rekt Fencer (@rektfencer) September 6, 2025 Altcoin Season And The Shakeout Some traders see the current pullback as a cleansing move. Trader Rekt Fencer said, “This is the final shakeout for altcoins,” pointing to falling volumes and nervous sentiment. That view is echoed by other market watchers who note that lower volumes can exaggerate price swings and make smaller tokens more volatile. Meanwhile, traders waiting for new inflows say they are watching ETF rollouts as a potential trigger for renewed interest in lower-cap assets. Anyone who thinks Bitcoin has to peak in Q4 of this year does not understand statistics or probability. The halving is completely irrelevant at this point, and there is zero fundamental reason—other than a psychological, self-fulfilling prophecy—for the peak to occur in Q4… — PlanC (@TheRealPlanC) September 5, 2025 Short-Term Risk Views And Cycle Warnings Market technician Daan Crypto Trades described Bitcoin’s price action as “undecisive” and warned it could sweep monthly lows to flush out late long positions. The analyst added that such a move should then cause some fear of it losing $100,000. Other analysts urge caution about drawing firm patterns from past cycles. Related Reading: Tighter Premiums Put Crypto Treasuries On Risky Road, According To NYDIG PlanC warned that relying on just three previous halving cycles is misleading, writing that anyone who expects Bitcoin to have to peak in Q4 this year “does not understand statistics or probability.” Michael van de Poppe offered a counterpoint, arguing that altcoins are “extremely undervalued” versus past cycles and that 2025 may play out very differently. title: Tokenize your .com domain on-chain and link it to your crypto wallet with Freename
body: Swiss-based web3 domain registrar Freename has rolled out a new Web2 domain integration, allowing traditional domains such as .com, .ai, and .io to be linked to crypto wallets and on-chain identities. Crypto users have long been able to use crypto-specific domains like .defi as wallet addresses to accept payments or verify ownership. Now, Freename is bringing those same capabilities to popular mainstream domains. Accepting crypto payments is easier than ever The launch marks the first time a single domain can operate across both the traditional internet and decentralized applications, according to the company. Businesses and individuals can now register or transfer standard Web2 domains on Freename’s platform and use them for everything from websites and email to receiving crypto payments. In practice, this means a business could accept USDT payments at mybusiness.com instead of sharing long wallet strings. Freelancers could send and receive crypto directly to name.ai, while the domains continue functioning as normal for email and websites. “With this launch, the internet evolves from static to dynamic,” said Davide Vicini, CEO and co-founder of Freename. “In Web2, domains only pointed to servers. In Web3, they become multi-purpose: unlocking wallets, payments, smart contracts, and on-chain operations. Today, that future becomes reality.” Freename’s on-chain DNS system is designed to ensure that Web3 domains resolve in standard browsers while also enabling Web2 domains to work across wallets and payment platforms. Users can even create and monetize their own top-level domains, earning royalties from registrations. “Your .com is now your wallet,” said Mattia Martone, Freename’s COO and co-founder. “We’re building the Unified Internet, where domains act as secure, multi-chain digital passports, empowering everyone to unify and control their digital identity.” The company is celebrating the rollout with promotions including up to 50% off Web3 registrations, free .com domains with qualifying purchases, and $10 credits per Web2 domain transfer for use toward Web3 services. How to link a .com domain to your crypto wallet To link your MetaMask wallet (required) with a .com or other traditional domain of your choice, follow the steps below. 1. Register or transfer your .com domain* on Freename Users can register new .com domains or bring their existing ones to Freename. *This works with all Web2 popular extensions, like .ai, .xyz, .io and not only .com. 2. Freename mirrors the .com domain on-chain Using proprietary Blockchain-Mirroring Technology, the DNS-based .com is tokenized into an on-chain identity. This creates a one-to-one mapping between the Web2 DNS domain and its on-chain version. 3. Link to your crypto wallet The user connects a wallet (e.g., MetaMask with Freename) to associate with his mirrored .com domain. 4. Start receiving crypto payments Instead of sharing long and complex wallet addresses, users can now receive payments directly to their .com domain (e.g., alice.com) using MetaMask for example. Payments are routed securely through the on-chain mapping created by Freename. The bottom line As Freename highlights in its press release, the timing is critical, noting that the number of Web3 wallets now exceeds that of registered domains. Demand for integrated digital identities has never been greater. The company sees this as part of a $141 billion market opportunity spanning DNS, blockchain, and decentralized identity services. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Welcome to the Era of Unified Internet: Freename's Innovative Domain Integration
body: Freename, a pioneering Swiss-based web3 domain registrar, recently introduced a groundbreaking service that integrates traditional .com, .ai, and .io domains with blockchain technology. This integration enables these domains to link directly to crypto wallets, marking a significant milestone in the fusion of conventional internet functionalities with decentralised applications. Revolutionizing Digital Identity and Transactions The innovative service by Freename allows users to transform their regular domain names into blockchain-powered entities. This means a standard domain name like mybusiness.com can now be used not just for hosting a website or managing email communications but also for receiving cryptocurrency payments seamlessly. For instance, freelancers can receive payments in crypto directly to their personalized domain like name.ai. Freename's breakthrough on-chain DNS system ensures that these traditional domains operate smoothly across various digital platforms, including crypto wallets and payment gateways, without compromising the usual web functions. Enhancing Usability with Blockchain Technology According to Freename, the ability to operate a domain name on both the traditional internet and decentralized applications is now a reality. This dual functionality facilitates the execution of smart contracts, enhances digital identity verification, and streamlines crypto transactions using domains as easy-to-remember wallet addresses. Davide Vicini, CEO and co-founder of Freename, explains, "Domains were static pointers to servers in the Web2 era. Now, they evolve into dynamic tools that facilitate payments, identity verification, and other blockchain functions. This is a major leap towards a dynamic internet." How To Connect Your Domain with Crypto Wallets Linking your domain to services like MetaMask simplifies digital transactions. Here’s how you can do it: Register or transfer your desired domain to the Freename platform. This could be a new .com domain or an existing one you own. Freename then mirrors your domain on the blockchain, tokenizing it as an on-chain identity. Finally, link this blockchain-mirrored domain to your crypto wallet, such as MetaMask, enabling you to receive or send payments directly via the domain, exemplified by alice.com. This integration not only makes crypto transactions easier but also secures your digital identity across multiple platforms. Special Promotions to Celebrate the Integration Freename is currently offering several promotional deals to celebrate this new capability. These include up to 50% off on new Web3 domain registrations, complementary .com domain registrations with certain purchases, and further credits for transferring existing domains into the new service. In Conclusion: A New Digital Era The innovative integration by Freename offers a profound enhancement in how digital identities and transactions are managed online, aligning with the needs of an increasing number of Web3 wallet users. Mattia Martone, COO and co-founder of Freename, emphasizes, "We're not just linking domains to wallets; we're crafting a unified internet where domains serve as multi-chain digital passports." As the digital landscape continues to evolve, Freename’s innovative solutions stand out, aiming to empower users with seamless, secure, and efficient online experiences. title: As Ripple SWELL 2025 Knocks, Researcher Says Get Ready for Two More XRP Price Runs
body: Ripple’s annual SWELL conference has become one of the most anticipated events in the crypto calendar, often stirring speculation about XRP’s price trajectory. With the 2025 edition just two months away, crypto researcher Ripple Van Winkle has drawn attention to historical patterns suggesting that XRP could be primed for two price runs in October and November, followed by a continuation into early 2026. Historical Patterns Around SWELL Van Winkle points to past market behavior to support his thesis. In 2017, during the height of the bull market, XRP surged nearly 200% in the weeks leading up to SWELL. The following year, when former U.S. President Bill Clinton headlined the event, XRP doubled again before retracing. However, the 2019 and 2020 conferences, which were held virtually during the pandemic, failed to deliver similar price action. Van Winkle dismisses those years as outliers, arguing that in-person SWELL events during bull markets tend to fuel speculative rallies . Every time Ripple hosts their Swell event, XRP follows a crazy pattern. In bull run years, October and November, leading up to Swell, are called Uptober. Get ready for two more runs. #XRP #Swell pic.twitter.com/YyWd3QpoMx — Ripple Van Winkle | Crypto Researcher (@RipBullWinkle) September 7, 2025 The Current Market Context As of report time, XRP is trading around $2.98, showing stability amid broader crypto market volatility. Technical analysts point to tightening Bollinger Bands and Moving Averages (MA) trends as indicators of a possible breakout. Bitcoin’s price, currently above $118,000, continues to guide overall market sentiment, with liquidity rotation into altcoins like XRP seen as a natural next step if the broader uptrend holds. Why SWELL 2025 Matters This year’s SWELL is scheduled for early November in New York, and Ripple has already unveiled a strong lineup of speakers and partners . Beyond its symbolic role, SWELL is a platform where Ripple typically showcases its enterprise blockchain initiatives, central bank collaborations, and product expansions. Such announcements often amplify investor interest, especially when the event coincides with a bullish macro environment. For many traders, SWELL serves as a timing signal that attracts liquidity and fuels speculation. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Van Winkle’s “Uptober” Thesis Van Winkle describes October as “Uptober,” a month where XRP historically gains momentum ahead of SWELL. He thinks the 2025 market setup resembles the 2017–2018 bull run, allowing for significant price moves in October and November, followed by another possible surge in Q1 2026. While his perspective captures the community’s excitement, it is important to note that markets are influenced by broader liquidity flows, regulatory news, and institutional positioning — not just seasonal patterns. What to Watch in the Coming Weeks Heading into SWELL, traders are monitoring exchange balances, large whale transfers, and institutional flows related to crypto ETFs. Ripple’s ongoing expansion of its payment network and stablecoin RLUSD are also in focus, as these developments could complement speculative momentum. However, analysts caution against relying solely on historical repetition. While SWELL can act as a catalyst, risk management and clear trading strategies remain crucial. Outlook Should historical patterns hold, XRP could face sharp volatility ahead, with potential short-term moves in October and November. Mixing optimism with caution is advisable for investors. SWELL may amplify momentum, but fundamentals and broader market conditions will ultimately determine XRP’s trajectory. title: El Salvador Bitcoin: Celebrating 4 Years of a Bold and Revolutionary Experiment
body: BitcoinWorld El Salvador Bitcoin: Celebrating 4 Years of a Bold and Revolutionary Experiment Four years ago, El Salvador made a groundbreaking decision that captured global attention: adopting Bitcoin as legal tender. To commemorate this significant milestone, the nation recently made a symbolic purchase of 21 BTC. This move once again highlights the ongoing commitment to El Salvador Bitcoin and its vision for the future. What Does El Salvador’s Symbolic Bitcoin Purchase Mean? On September 7th, El Salvador marked the fourth anniversary of its pioneering legal tender law by acquiring 21 Bitcoins. This isn’t just a random number; it’s a direct and symbolic nod to Bitcoin’s finite maximum supply of 21 million coins. It’s a powerful gesture, reinforcing the nation’s dedication to the digital asset. This purchase, as reported by CryptoPotato, signifies more than just an investment. It serves as a public declaration of El Salvador’s enduring belief in Bitcoin’s potential. It also reminds the world of the unique path the nation has forged in the global financial landscape. The Genesis of El Salvador Bitcoin Adoption The journey of El Salvador Bitcoin as legal tender began with President Nayib Bukele’s bold announcement. The aim was ambitious: to foster greater financial inclusion for its unbanked population, reduce costly remittance fees, and attract foreign investment. This decision made El Salvador the first country in the world to embrace Bitcoin in such a comprehensive manner. Initially, the move faced both excitement and skepticism. However, the government pressed ahead, introducing initiatives like the Chivo Wallet and encouraging businesses to accept Bitcoin for everyday transactions. This revolutionary step aimed to integrate a decentralized digital currency into the fabric of a national economy. Benefits and Real-World Impact of El Salvador Bitcoin Over the past four years, the adoption of El Salvador Bitcoin has yielded several notable benefits for the nation: Reduced Remittance Costs: Salvadorans living abroad can send money home with significantly lower fees, directly benefiting families. Financial Inclusion: Many citizens previously excluded from traditional banking now have access to digital financial services through Bitcoin. Tourism Boost: Bitcoin enthusiasts and digital nomads have been drawn to El Salvador, contributing to the local economy. Energy Innovation: The country is leveraging its geothermal energy resources (volcanoes) to mine Bitcoin, showcasing a sustainable approach. Increased Financial Literacy: Citizens are learning about digital assets, blockchain technology, and new economic models. These impacts demonstrate a tangible shift towards a more modern and inclusive financial system. Navigating the Challenges and Looking Ahead Despite the successes, the journey of El Salvador Bitcoin has not been without its challenges. Price volatility remains a significant concern for many, and international financial bodies have expressed caution. Furthermore, ensuring widespread adoption and technological literacy across the entire population is an ongoing effort. However, El Salvador remains committed. The government continues to explore new avenues, such as issuing Bitcoin-backed bonds and expanding infrastructure. The long-term vision involves fully integrating Bitcoin into the national economy, positioning El Salvador as a hub for innovation in the digital asset space. This ongoing experiment offers valuable lessons for other nations considering similar paths. El Salvador’s decision to make Bitcoin legal tender four years ago was a historic moment. The recent symbolic purchase of 21 BTC reaffirms the nation’s pioneering spirit and its enduring belief in the digital currency. The journey of El Salvador Bitcoin continues to be a bold and revolutionary experiment, offering a unique case study in how a sovereign nation can embrace decentralized finance. As the world watches, El Salvador remains at the forefront of this digital transformation, continually pushing the boundaries of traditional finance. Frequently Asked Questions About El Salvador Bitcoin Why did El Salvador make Bitcoin legal tender? El Salvador adopted Bitcoin as legal tender primarily to promote financial inclusion for its unbanked population, reduce the cost of remittances sent by citizens abroad, and stimulate economic growth and foreign investment. What is the significance of buying 21 BTC? The purchase of 21 BTC is a symbolic gesture. It refers to Bitcoin’s hard-capped maximum supply of 21 million coins, emphasizing the scarcity and unique properties of the digital asset. How has El Salvador Bitcoin impacted its economy? The impact includes significant savings on remittance fees, a boost in tourism, increased financial literacy among citizens, and the development of sustainable Bitcoin mining operations using geothermal energy. What challenges has El Salvador faced with Bitcoin adoption? Key challenges include Bitcoin’s price volatility, skepticism from international financial institutions, and the ongoing effort to ensure widespread technological adoption and understanding among all citizens. What are El Salvador’s future plans for Bitcoin? El Salvador plans to further integrate Bitcoin into its economy, explore Bitcoin-backed bonds, and continue developing infrastructure to solidify its position as a leader in digital finance and blockchain innovation. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and colleagues on social media to spread awareness about El Salvador’s groundbreaking journey with Bitcoin! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin’s institutional adoption. This post El Salvador Bitcoin: Celebrating 4 Years of a Bold and Revolutionary Experiment first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Memecoins Rally: What's Next for Dogecoin (DOGE), Pudgy Penguins (PENGU), and Dogwifhat (WIF)?
body: Bitcoin is threatening to break through major resistance on Monday. At the same time the memecoins are starting to get up a head of steam. What’s next for memecoin frontrunners Dogecoin (DOGE), Pudgy Penguins (PENGU), and Dogwifhat (WIF)? Take some profits on $DOGE? Source: TradingView The 12-hour time frame for $DOGE shows how the undisputed memecoin leader has broken through the downtrend line, even though it had previously dropped out of the triangle. The bulls will now have the $0.24 horizontal resistance in their sights. That said, taking some profits here, or as the price ascends towards the bigger resistance level, could be a good idea. All the short-term momentum indicators have hit the top and so the next downward impulse could be about to start soon. Macro higher highs and higher lows for $DOGE Source: TradingView In the macro perspective of the weekly time frame all appears well for the $DOGE price so far. Higher highs and higher lows have been made, and it now remains to battle through this overhead horizontal resistance. At the bottom of the chart, the Stochastic RSI indicators look to be undecided as to whether it’s up or down, and the RSI right at the bottom of the chart shows that the indicator line is poised to either break the downtrend or to get rejected again. $PENGU hits resistance Source: TradingView Much like the $DOGE chart, the $PENGU chart is showing a big resistance level that is stopping further upside progress. Also in a similar vein, the shorter time frame Stochastic RSI indicators are starting to top out. For $PENGU it just might be that there is going to have to be some more sideways price action before that definitive move that breaks through the resistance plus the top of the bull flag. $PENGU excellent longer term setup Source: TradingView The weekly time frame illustrates that $PENGU is still in what looks like an excellent setup. Even if the bull flag does not break this week, there is always next week (Bitcoin allowing obviously). $WIF likely to be rejected from strong resistance Source: TradingView $WIF is more of an outside bet than the previous two memecoins, but should the price break through and confirm above the $0.85 horizontal resistance level, a continuance up to $1 could be next. That said, this is very strong resistance, and all the shorter term momentum indicators are very much in the overbought zone. Like the other two memecoins, $WIF is likely to be rejected here, but after another period of sideways price action the bulls could get their chance again. One last big chance for $WIF? Source: TradingView The weekly chart view for $WIF illustrates the difficult task ahead of the bulls. If, as is expected, the price is rejected from here, the Stochastic RSI indicators can fall further towards the bottom. Once these indicators do cross back up, the $WIF bulls will perhaps have one last opportunity to surpass the major resistance at $1.37. If this does happen, $2 would be the next target. title: Cognition AI’s Astonishing $10.2 Billion Valuation: A Triumph in AI Coding Fundraising
body: BitcoinWorld Cognition AI’s Astonishing $10.2 Billion Valuation: A Triumph in AI Coding Fundraising In the fast-paced world of technology and cryptocurrency, where market sentiments can shift in an instant, news of a major funding round often sends ripples of excitement. The recent announcement that Cognition AI , the innovative force behind the AI coding agent Devin, has successfully closed a $400 million funding round at a staggering $10.2 billion valuation is nothing short of a landmark event. This significant achievement not only underscores the immense potential of advanced AI solutions but also highlights a remarkable triumph amidst what many perceive as a turbulent investment climate. Cognition AI’s Meteoric Rise: What’s Driving the $10.2 Billion Valuation? The journey of Cognition AI from a $4 billion valuation earlier this year to a formidable $10.2 billion is a testament to investor confidence in its groundbreaking technology and strategic vision. This latest capital injection, spearheaded by Peter Thiel-backed Founders Fund, alongside existing investors such as Lux Capital, Joe Lonsdale’s 8VC, Elad Gil, Definition Capital, and Swish Ventures, signals a strong belief in the company’s long-term prospects. For many, this raise is not just about the numbers; it’s about validating the burgeoning sector of AI-driven software development. The rapid ascent in startup valuation for Cognition AI can be attributed to several key factors: Disruptive Technology: Devin, the company’s flagship AI coding agent, represents a paradigm shift in how software is developed. By automating complex coding tasks, Devin promises to dramatically increase developer productivity and accelerate innovation cycles. Exceptional Growth in Revenue: The most compelling evidence of Cognition AI’s impact is its annual recurring revenue (ARR) from Devin, which skyrocketed from $1 million in September 2024 to an impressive $73 million by June. This explosive growth demonstrates strong market adoption and a clear demand for its product. Lean Operations: Despite its rapid expansion, Cognition AI has maintained a lean operational structure, with net burn remaining under $20 million since its inception two years ago. This financial prudence is highly attractive to investors looking for efficient growth. Strategic Acquisitions: The acquisition of AI coding startup Windsurf in July, shortly after Google poached its CEO and co-founders, showcases Cognition AI’s aggressive strategy to consolidate talent and technology, further solidifying its market position. This substantial fundraising round not only provides Cognition AI with significant capital to fuel its research and development but also enhances its competitive edge in a rapidly evolving AI landscape. Devin: The AI Coding Agent Redefining Software Development At the heart of Cognition AI ‘s success lies Devin, the world’s first fully autonomous AI software engineer. Devin is not merely a coding assistant; it is designed to handle entire development projects from start to finish. This includes understanding complex prompts, writing code, debugging, testing, and even deploying applications. For developers and tech companies, Devin offers a transformative solution to the perennial challenges of efficiency and speed in software creation. The impact of Devin can be summarized through its key benefits: Benefit Area Description Increased Productivity Devin can complete coding tasks significantly faster than human developers, freeing up human talent for more complex, creative, or strategic work. Accelerated Development Cycles By automating repetitive or time-consuming coding processes, Devin shortens the time-to-market for new software products and features. Enhanced Code Quality AI-driven agents like Devin can potentially reduce human error in coding, leading to more robust and reliable software. Scalability Companies can scale their development efforts more easily without proportional increases in human resources, addressing talent shortages. The impressive surge in annual recurring revenue for Devin is a clear indicator that businesses are quickly recognizing and adopting the value it brings. This signals a new era for AI coding , where intelligent agents are becoming indispensable tools in the software development ecosystem. Strategic Acumen and Navigating the Challenges of AI Startup Fundraising While Cognition AI ‘s recent success paints a picture of unbridled growth, the path of a high-growth startup is rarely without its complexities. The acquisition of Windsurf, an AI coding startup, was a shrewd move to integrate talent and technology, especially given Google’s prior interest in Windsurf’s leadership. Such strategic maneuvers are crucial for maintaining a competitive edge in the fierce AI market. However, the article also sheds light on internal dynamics that underscore the intense pressures within high-stakes tech startups. Cognition AI has reportedly cultivated a demanding work environment, expecting 80-hour, six-day work weeks from its employees. This rigorous culture recently led to the layoff of 30 staffers and an offer of buyouts to the remaining 200 employees, providing an exit for those unable or unwilling to meet the stringent demands. This situation presents a nuanced perspective on fundraising and startup valuation . While external investors see immense potential and financial prudence, the internal human cost of such rapid growth and high expectations can be significant. It raises important questions about sustainability, employee well-being, and the long-term impact of hyper-growth strategies on company culture. Balancing aggressive growth targets with a healthy work environment remains a critical challenge for many fast-scaling tech companies. The Future of AI Coding and its Impact on Startup Valuations The triumph of Cognition AI is more than just a company milestone; it’s a powerful indicator of the future direction of technology. The rapid advancements in AI coding are set to revolutionize various industries, making software development more accessible, efficient, and innovative. This success story will undoubtedly inspire further investment and innovation in the broader AI sector, including generative AI, machine learning, and automation. For investors, Cognition AI’s journey offers valuable insights: Focus on Problem-Solving: Invest in AI solutions that address fundamental industry pain points with tangible, measurable results (like Devin’s ARR growth). Evaluate Strategic Acumen: Look for startups that can make smart acquisitions and adapt quickly to market shifts. Understand the Human Element: While financial metrics are crucial, understanding a company’s internal culture and its ability to retain top talent is also vital for long-term success. For aspiring founders, the lesson is clear: disruptive innovation combined with efficient execution can attract significant capital, even in challenging market conditions. However, building a sustainable company also requires careful consideration of team dynamics and employee welfare. The incredible startup valuation achieved by Cognition AI serves as a beacon for the entire AI industry, signaling that groundbreaking innovation, especially in the realm of AI-driven automation, continues to command premium investor interest and substantial financial backing. Conclusion: A Dual Narrative of Triumph and Tension Cognition AI ‘s monumental $400 million funding round at a $10.2 billion valuation is an undeniable testament to its pioneering work with Devin, the AI coding agent. It highlights the immense potential and investor appetite for transformative AI technologies that promise to reshape industries. This achievement solidifies its position as a frontrunner in the AI landscape, demonstrating how strategic vision, rapid product adoption, and financial discipline can lead to extraordinary success. However, the narrative is also tempered by the intense demands placed on its workforce, reminding us that behind every valuation figure are human stories of dedication and, at times, considerable pressure. As Cognition AI continues its journey, the tech world will be watching not only its technological advancements but also how it balances hyper-growth with sustainable company culture. This milestone is a powerful signal that the future of software development is deeply intertwined with advanced AI, and the race to innovate is only just beginning. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI models features. This post Cognition AI’s Astonishing $10.2 Billion Valuation: A Triumph in AI Coding Fundraising first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Dogecoin Price Prediction: $3.36B Positions Stay Open – Are Degens Betting Big on the Next Explosive Rally?
body: We’re just 32 days away from the SEC’s final call on more than 92 Spot ETFs, and that includes the Grayscale Dogecoin ETF, the first memecoin ETF ever. Bloomberg experts still have the approval odds sitting above 90%. This decision will have a huge effect on Dogecoin price prediction. Dogecoin also stands out with its massive open interest levels. Futures positions are steady at nearly 17 billion DOGE, worth about $4.01B. CoinGlass data shows barely any pullback, and the numbers are actually up over 15% in the last 24 hours. That means roughly 16.82 billion DOGE, still around $3.99B, are locked into the derivatives market even while the wider market slows down. 16.82 Billion DOGE Remain On The Market Source: CoinGlass Gate.io is leading the pack in Dogecoin futures, holding over $1.02B in open contracts. Binance follows with about 20.65% of total open interest, roughly $824.56M, making it another major hub for DOGE exposure. Price-wise, DOGE has been chopping in the same zone without picking a clear direction, but the steady futures positioning shows investors aren’t losing confidence in the coin just yet. Dogecoin Price Prediction: Will the SEC Trigger a Historic $1 Rally? Source: DOGEUSD / TradingView Currently, the DOGE price is breaking out against that white descending trendline, which has been the main resistance wall for weeks. If the price breaks and holds above it, the next real test will be in the $0.26–0.30 zone. The RSI is already sitting at 80, so a small dip could hit before the breakout, especially with the SEC meeting around the corner and rate-cut talk adding extra volatility. The MACD just flipped positive, suggesting fresh bullish energy. title: AI Breakthrough: Edo Liberty Unveils the Revolutionary Power of Smarter Search at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025
body: BitcoinWorld AI Breakthrough: Edo Liberty Unveils the Revolutionary Power of Smarter Search at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 In the rapidly evolving digital landscape, where blockchain innovations meet the frontier of artificial intelligence, a profound shift is underway. While the crypto world often focuses on decentralized ledgers and digital assets, the underlying intelligence powering these systems is equally critical. Imagine an AI that doesn’t just process data but truly understands and retrieves it with unparalleled precision, driving smarter decisions in DeFi, Web3, and beyond. This isn’t a distant dream; it’s the imminent reality that Pinecone founder Edo Liberty will unveil at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 . He posits that the next major AI breakthrough won’t come from simply building larger models, but from equipping AI with a vastly superior brain—one powered by advanced search capabilities. What Defines the Next AI Breakthrough ? For years, the race in artificial intelligence has been largely dominated by the pursuit of “bigger.” Bigger models, trained on bigger datasets, promising bigger leaps in capability. However, this approach often hits a wall when it comes to accuracy, relevance, and the ability to adapt to new, specific information without costly retraining. Edo Liberty, a visionary who helped build foundational AI at Amazon, argues that the true AI breakthrough is not about brute force, but about surgical precision. He believes that the future of AI-native applications lies not in the sheer size of their neural networks, but in their capacity for intelligent data retrieval. Consider the challenges faced by current large language models (LLMs): Hallucinations: Generating factually incorrect or nonsensical information, which can be detrimental in critical applications like financial reporting or medical advice. Outdated Knowledge: Limited to the data they were trained on, often missing real-time information crucial for dynamic fields such as market analysis or current events. Lack of Specificity: Struggling to provide highly relevant answers to niche queries without extensive and costly fine-tuning, making them less effective for specialized tasks. Computational Cost: The immense resources required for training and deploying ever-larger models, posing significant barriers for smaller organizations and startups. Liberty’s perspective offers a compelling alternative: instead of trying to cram all knowledge into a single model, we should empower models to access and synthesize information from external, up-to-date knowledge bases. This paradigm shift is poised to redefine how we interact with AI, making it more reliable, agile, and cost-effective. It’s about augmenting intelligence with context, rather than simply scaling parameters. This approach promises a more sustainable and powerful path to the next generation of AI capabilities. The Crucial Role of Smarter Search in AI’s Future At the heart of this new AI paradigm is smarter search . This isn’t the keyword-matching search of yesterday; it’s a sophisticated, semantic search powered by vector databases and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). RAG allows AI models to look up information from an external knowledge base before generating a response. This process significantly enhances the accuracy, relevance, and factual grounding of AI outputs. Consider a traditional AI chatbot that can only respond based on its pre-trained data. If you ask it about the latest Bitcoin halving event or a recent regulatory change in the crypto market, it might struggle or “hallucinate” an answer because that information wasn’t part of its original training dataset. With RAG, the AI first performs a highly intelligent search within a constantly updated database, retrieving the most relevant articles, reports, or data points. Only then does it use its generative capabilities to formulate an accurate and contextually rich response, citing its sources if programmed to do so. This makes the AI a powerful research assistant, not just a static knowledge base. Here’s why RAG and intelligent retrieval are becoming indispensable: Enhanced Accuracy: By fetching real-time or domain-specific information, AI can provide more precise and factually correct answers, drastically reducing “hallucinations.” This is particularly vital in fields where precision is paramount, such as financial analysis, legal counsel, or medical diagnostics. Up-to-Date Information: AI applications can access the latest data without needing to be retrained, making them adaptable to rapidly changing environments, crucial for dynamic sectors like cryptocurrency, stock markets, and breaking news. Imagine an AI providing real-time market sentiment analysis by pulling the latest news and social media trends. Reduced Training Costs: Instead of costly and time-consuming model retraining, RAG allows models to leverage existing, continuously updated external data. This democratizes access to powerful AI capabilities, enabling smaller startups to compete with larger players without needing immense computational resources for constant model updates. Domain-Specific Expertise: AI can be equipped with specialized knowledge bases, enabling it to excel in particular fields like legal, medical, or financial analysis, providing expert-level insights. For instance, a RAG-powered AI could become an expert on specific blockchain protocols or regulatory frameworks by querying a curated database of whitepapers and legal documents. Transparency and Trust: Users can often see the sources from which the AI retrieved its information, building greater trust and allowing for verification. This auditability is a significant advantage in regulated industries and for fostering user confidence. This approach transforms AI from a static knowledge base into a dynamic, informed reasoning engine. It’s about giving AI the tools to “think” by providing it with the most relevant context, ensuring that its responses are not just fluent, but also factually sound and deeply informed. The ability to perform smarter search quickly and efficiently across vast datasets is the key to unlocking AI’s full potential, making it a truly invaluable asset in every sector. Meet Edo Liberty : Architecting AI’s New Brain When it comes to understanding the future of AI, few voices carry as much weight as Edo Liberty . His journey through the technological landscape is marked by significant contributions to the very foundations of modern AI. Before founding Pinecone, Liberty played a pivotal role in building the backbone of AI infrastructure at Amazon, a company synonymous with large-scale data processing and cutting-edge machine learning applications. This experience gave him unique insights into the challenges and opportunities that arise when deploying AI at an enterprise level, from managing immense data volumes to ensuring real-time performance. Liberty’s vision for Pinecone stems from a deep understanding that the existing infrastructure for managing and searching unstructured data was not equipped for the demands of next-generation AI. He recognized that as AI models became more sophisticated, their reliance on efficient and intelligent data retrieval would grow exponentially. His work focuses on bridging this gap, providing the foundational technology that allows AI to move beyond mere pattern recognition to true contextual understanding, mimicking how humans access and process information. At Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025, Liberty will share his profound insights, drawing from years of experience at the forefront of AI innovation. Attendees will gain a unique perspective on the architectural shifts required to build AI systems that are not only powerful but also practical, scalable, and truly intelligent. His session, “Why the Next Frontier Is Search,” is an opportunity to learn directly from one of the industry’s most influential minds about the strategies and technologies that will define the next decade of AI development, offering a clear roadmap for innovators and enterprises alike. How Pinecone Powers Next-Gen AI Applications Central to Edo Liberty’s vision for AI is Pinecone , the company he founded and leads as CEO. Pinecone is at the forefront of developing purpose-built infrastructure for AI, specifically focusing on vector databases. These databases are a critical component for enabling the kind of smarter search that RAG models require. Unlike traditional databases that store structured data or simple text, vector databases store information as “embeddings”—numerical representations that capture the semantic meaning of data. Think of it this way: when you search for a specific keyword in a traditional database, it looks for exact matches. A vector database, however, understands the meaning behind your query. If you search for “cars,” it might also return results related to “automobiles,” “vehicles,” or even specific car models, because their embeddings are semantically close. This capability is revolutionary for AI, allowing it to retrieve information based on conceptual understanding rather than just lexical similarity. Pinecone’s high-performance infrastructure is designed to manage these vector embeddings at scale. It can index billions of data points and execute complex similarity searches in milliseconds, making it ideal for real-time AI applications. This robust backend is essential for supporting the demands of modern AI, where immediate access to relevant information is paramount for providing accurate and timely responses. Pinecone’s impact is already being felt across various industries: For Developers: Pinecone provides an intuitive and scalable platform that simplifies the integration of RAG into AI applications. Its APIs are designed for ease of use, freeing developers to focus on core logic and innovative features rather than grappling with complex infrastructure challenges. This accelerates development cycles and allows for rapid prototyping of AI-native solutions. For Enterprises: Companies can build highly accurate and context-aware AI systems for a multitude of applications. This includes sophisticated customer support chatbots that can pull answers from vast internal knowledge bases, personalized content recommendation engines, intelligent fraud detection systems, and efficient internal knowledge management tools. By leveraging their proprietary data securely within Pinecone, enterprises can gain a significant competitive edge and unlock new operational efficiencies. Scalability: Designed for high performance and elasticity, Pinecone can handle massive volumes of data and millions of queries per second. This ensures that AI applications remain responsive and reliable, even as user bases grow and data sets expand exponentially. Its cloud-native architecture means it can scale up or down as needed, optimizing resource utilization and cost-effectiveness. Versatility: From powering personalized search experiences to enhancing chatbots, recommendation engines, and even scientific research tools, Pinecone’s technology is foundational for a wide array of AI-native products. Its ability to handle diverse data types—text, images, audio—transformed into vector embeddings, makes it a versatile tool for any AI-driven project seeking to leverage semantic understanding. With hundreds of thousands of developers and enterprise teams already leveraging Pinecone, it has become a cornerstone of the modern AI stack. Liberty’s work with Pinecone is not just about building a product; it’s about providing the essential infrastructure that will unlock the full potential of AI, making intelligent, context-aware applications a reality for everyone, from individual developers to global corporations. Don’t Miss Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 : Your Gateway to AI Innovation The insights from Edo Liberty are just one compelling reason to attend Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 . Scheduled for October 27–29 at the prestigious Moscone West in San Francisco, this event is poised to be a nexus for innovation, bringing together 10,000+ startup and VC leaders, alongside a vibrant community of innovators and tech enthusiasts. While the name “Bitcoin World Disrupt” might suggest a primary focus on cryptocurrency, the event has clearly broadened its scope to encompass the most disruptive technologies shaping our future, with AI taking a prominent stage. This conference is more than just a series of talks; it’s an ecosystem designed to foster connections, spark ideas, and accelerate growth. Whether you are a founder seeking investment, an investor scouting the next unicorn, or an innovator looking for a front-row seat to tomorrow’s technology, Disrupt 2025 offers unparalleled opportunities. The event agenda is meticulously crafted to cover a wide array of topics crucial for navigating the future of tech, including deep dives into enterprise solutions, the burgeoning startup ecosystem, and the transformative power of AI across industries. Key reasons to secure your pass: Networking Opportunities: Connect with a diverse audience of industry leaders, potential collaborators, and future partners. Imagine striking a deal with a venture capitalist over coffee or finding your next co-founder at a networking reception. The sheer concentration of talent and decision-makers makes this an invaluable networking hub. Cutting-Edge Insights: Gain exclusive access to presentations and fireside chats from visionaries like Edo Liberty, covering the most critical trends in AI, blockchain, enterprise tech, and startups. Learn directly from the architects of tomorrow’s technology about their strategies and predictions. Investor Access: Founders will have dedicated opportunities to pitch their ventures to leading venture capitalists. This direct access can be a game-changer for securing funding and gaining crucial feedback on your business model. Skill Development: Sharpen your business acumen, pitch strategies, and understanding of emerging technologies through workshops and expert-led sessions. The knowledge gained can be immediately applied to your projects and career. Future-Proofing Your Business: Understand where the AI and tech ecosystems are heading to strategically position your projects and investments. Staying ahead of the curve is not just an advantage; it’s a necessity in today’s fast-paced technological landscape. Inspiration and Vision: Immerse yourself in an environment charged with innovation. Witness firsthand the technologies and ideas that are set to redefine industries, offering inspiration for your own endeavors and potentially sparking your next big idea. The “AI Stage” fireside chat and presentation by Edo Liberty is highlighted as a must-attend session, promising a roadmap to the future of AI development. This is your chance to understand how smarter search and advanced retrieval mechanisms are fundamentally changing the game. With Regular Bird rates offering savings of up to $668 before they expire after September 26, now is the opportune moment to secure your place at the epicenter of innovation. Don’t miss this crucial opportunity to immerse yourself in the discussions that will define the next generation of AI and tech, paving the way for revolutionary advancements in every digital domain. The landscape of artificial intelligence is undergoing a profound transformation, moving beyond the race for ever-larger models towards a future defined by intelligence and precision. As Edo Liberty, the visionary founder of Pinecone, will illuminate at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 , the next truly significant AI breakthrough will stem from the power of smarter search . By leveraging advanced retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and purpose-built vector databases, AI models can access, understand, and synthesize information with unprecedented accuracy and relevance. This fundamental shift, championed by Edo Liberty and brought to life by Pinecone , promises to unlock AI’s full potential, making it more reliable, scalable, and genuinely intelligent. For anyone involved in building, investing in, or simply understanding the future of technology, attending Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 is an essential step to grasp these transformative developments and position themselves at the forefront of innovation. title: Infleqtion, a quantum computing firm, has agreed to a merger at a $1.8 billion valuation
body: Infleqtion, a quantum computing and precision sensor company, has achieved unicorn status with a pre-money valuation of $1.8 billion through a merger with Churchill Capital Corp X, a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) led by Michael Klein. The deal was announced on September 8, 2025, and the merger is expected to close later this year or early 2026. The merger is expected to accelerate Infleqtion’s goal of commercializing quantum products . The deal will provide more than $540 million, including a co-investment from institutional investors Maverick Capital, Counterpoint Global, and Glynn Capital, among others. Infleqtion hits the billion-dollar milestone Chief Executive Officer Matthew Kinsella anticipates the deal will be completed later this year or early next year. The CEO also said the possibility of a swift listing was a key driver for the merge with a SPAC. The timeline he is anticipating compares to an 18- to 24-month process via an IPO. The SPAC involved in the deal had roughly $416 million in cash held in its trust accounts as of June ending, and this is supposed to pair with the $125 million in a common stock PIPE — private investment in public equity. The quantum firm agreed to the deal even though it had attracted interest from other SPACs, which pitched higher valuations, Kinesella added. Infleqtion will reportedly use proceeds from the merger to strengthen its balance sheet, accelerate investment in its quantum computer using the infamous neutral atom technology, and scale customer adoption. In addition to building quantum computers, Infleqtion has developed quantum sensor technology, which can be used for precision clocks and geolocation that can be a backup for the half-century-old GPS technology, facing increasing spoofing and blackouts. Infleqtion said last year that it secured $11 million from the US Defense Department to help advance its quantum positioning systems. As there is so far no quantum computer that can solve real-world problems, other quantum technology revenue can help provide funding until companies can build bigger systems that can solve problems such as breaking encryption or creating new drugs faster. Infleqtion said it has so far sold three quantum computers and hundreds of quantum sensors, generating about $29 million in trailing 12-month revenue as of June 30. The company expects about $50 million of booked and awarded business by the end of 2025. The quantum computing sector has gained pace recently As Cryptopolitan reported , things are heating up in the quantum computing sector, and New Mexico is making a move to become a hub for research and development. According to Forbes, New Mexico now has plans to team up with the Pentagon’s Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency to invest in quantum computing. Under the terms of the agreement , each party will provide up to $60 million over the next four years to build quantum computers that can solve problems conventional processors can’t. While AI is seeing exponential support compared to quantum, this year’s investment is already multiples of the $2 billion government support globally last year. The initiative involves a collaboration between local universities, government agencies, and private sector companies, including notable startups and established tech firms. “It’s going to require a lot of scientific effort,” New Mexico Governor Michelle Lujan Grisham said. “But we’re willing to create that business ecosystem.” The partnership, which will focus on various aspects of quantum computing, including algorithm development, hardware advancements, and practical applications across industries, will unfold over the next few years, with significant milestones expected in research funding and infrastructure development by 2025.
